thread.title: On the ground with a migrant 'caravan' heading to the U.S.

title: On the ground with a migrant 'caravan' heading to the U.S.
text:
On the ground with a migrant 'caravan' heading to the U.S. 3:47am IST - 02:00 
A caravan of hundreds of Central American migrants is hoping to make its way to the U.S. border but has been temporarily stalled in Mexico, after President Trump stepped up pressure on Mexican authorities.   
A caravan of hundreds of Central American migrants is hoping to make its way to the U.S. border but has been temporarily stalled in Mexico, after President Trump stepped up pressure on Mexican authorities.  //reut.rs/2JhrzRp
